meanings.sent1: She was unclothing before going to bed.
meanings.sent2: He unclothed quickly after coming home from work.
meanings.sent3: The magician unclothed in front of the audience, revealing a different outfit.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the sky seemed to unclothe itself of its vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The superhero unclothed to reveal their true identity.

meanings.definition: The act of taking off clothes
meanings.sent1: The unclothing was necessary for the medical examination.
meanings.sent2: After the play, the quick unclothing backstage surprised the crew.
meanings.sent3: The unclothing contest at the party was hilarious.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an unclothing of warmth in the cold room.
meanings.sent5: The unclothing of the old building revealed hidden treasures.
